Name: Murder by Moonlight 2 - Crimson Night
About the game: Strange murders have shaken the city, the work of a twisted killer who only comes out at night and leaves his victims drained of blood. Detective Elliot Moore has been assigned to the case, and he's beginning to see a potential suspect: a psychiatrist by the name of Dr. Lewis Holland. Help Detective Elliot in this thrilling Match3 Crime Story to solve the mysterious case. - A thrilling paranormal mystery told across five chapters - Truth or lies? Who can be trusted by Carol? - Challenging match-3 puzzles to unfold the story - Fun hidden object games - Uncover the dark truth behind the string of murders
